2.text: Boil a large pot of water at high heat.

3.text: Fill up a large bowl with ice cubes and cold water.

4.text: Boil your spinach for about 30-40 seconds until it turns bright green.

5.text: Submerge your spinach in the bowl of ice water for up to 1 minute.

6.text: Place your spinach into a strainer to drain the water.

7.text: Squeeze out the water from the spinach using your hands.

8.text: Put your spinach in a microwave-safe bowl.

10.text: Cook your spinach in the microwave on high heat for 2 minutes.

11.text: Place your spinach in ice water to stop it from overcooking.

12.text: Pour your spinach into a strainer to get rid of the water.

13.text: Use your spinach immediately if desired.

14.text: Refrigerate your spinach in an airtight container for 3-4 days.
